resources.string: Enter your first name and, if you wish, digits:
The picture shows the text "the Game of" and the word LIFE in colorful letters.
Please choose a username consisting only of letters and, if you like, digits at the end.
Do you want to enter the workforce right away or do you want to go to college for 100k to possibly get a better paying job later?

Action Cell: If you land on this cell, an action is performed. It can affect your money or the money of your fellow players, changing the game. Both you and your fellow players can see what has happened.
Family Cell: It is time to expand the family. If you land on this field, you will get a peg added to your car. These are then sold for 50k/peg when you retire.
Career Cell: Time for a new job. Choose one of two professions. Your current profession may also be included. Let`s see what life has in store for you.
House Cell: Time to buy a house. You can choose between two houses. Look carefully at the prices. Fate will decide whether the house is sold at the red or black sell price when you retire!

Wait Cell: This cell appears after stop cells. You have just made a difficult life decision. You are now at a new stage in your life. Family, wedding, early retirement? The decision was entirely up to you.
Stop Cell: It is time for an important life decision. Will you pass your exams? Will you get married, start a family? Do you want to retire early? Make important decisions at stop cells.
Retirement Cell: Yey finally retired. Your houses and family members are sold and the one with the most money wins. The earlier you retire, the more money you get on top.
Teleport Cell: You have the option to teleport forward by 2 cells, advancing your progress, or remain in your current cell, keeping your existing position. The choice is yours.
